subLesson.title: Alphabet
subLesson.description: Learn the alphabet in the Yoruba language

subLesson.title: Accent
subLesson.description: Learn the different tonal sound in the Yoruba language

text.English: I am pleased to meet you
text.Yoruba: Inú mi dún ùn láti mọ̀ yín

subLesson.title: Animals and Food
subLesson.description: Names of animals and Yoruba foods

subLesson.title: Subject with verbs
subLesson.description: Short sentence that connect prononus with verbs

text.Extra: This is third person in object position. The grammatical particle we will use is derived from the

text.English: They are the one who ate it
It is you who ate it
We are the one who ate it
He is the one who ate it
You are the one who ate it
I am the one that ate it

lesson.title: Nouns and Adjective
lesson.description: Learn more nonus and adjective in Yoruba

text.Yoruba: O ti mọ àwàdà ṣe púpọ̀ jù
Mo nífẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ gidi gan an
Jẹ́ kí n dì mọ́ ọ
Mo ń ṣisẹ́ ní ilé ìwòsàn

text.English: It is 4 ó clock in the afternoon
Today I have no time to
text.Yoruba: Ní òní mi ò ní àkókò fún

text.English: This year I don't want to celebrate
text.Yoruba: Ní ọdún yìí mi ò fẹ́ dáwọ̀ọ́ ìdùnnú
Kí ẹ ní òpin ọ̀sẹ̀ ayọ̀

text.English: Today is the 9th day of September
text.Yoruba: Òní ni ọjọ́ kẹsàn án oṣù ọwẹ́wẹ̀ (kẹsàn án)
Kín ni ó ti ṣe lónìí?
Kín ni ó fẹ́ ṣe ní ọ̀la?

text.English: What do you want to do tomorrow?
text.Yoruba: Kín ni ó wù ọ́ láti ṣe ní ọ̀la?

text.English: Tomorrow I want to meet my dad
text.Yoruba: Ní ọ̀la mo fẹ́ rí bàbá mi
Kín ni ó ṣe ní àná

text.English: Can you please speak a little slower
Can you please repeat the sentence
text.Yoruba: Dákun ǹjẹ́ o lè tún gbólóhùn yẹn sọ

text.English: Can you please say it again
text.Yoruba: Dákun ṣé o lè sọ ní ẹ̀ẹ̀kan si

text.English: Can you please write it down
text.Yoruba: Jọ̀wọ́ ṣé o lè kọ́ sílẹ̀

text.English: Can you please spell the word
text.Yoruba: Jọ̀ọ́ ṣé o lè pe ọ̀rọ̀ náà

text.English: Can you explain what this word mean?
text.Yoruba: Ṣe o lè ṣe àlàyé ìtumọ̀ ọ̀rọ̀ yìí?
Nǹkan tí ó wí kò yé mi

text.English: I don't understand this expression (body language)
text.Yoruba: Nnkan tí ó ń ṣe yìí kò yé mi

text.English: What would you like to drink?
I would like to drink water
Do you like to drink wine
text.Yoruba: Ṣé ẹ máa nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí wíínì

text.English: I will like a cup of coffee
text.Yoruba: Màá nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí ife kọfí kan

text.English: Do you like to drink tea
Do you want tea or water
text.Yoruba: Ṣé wàá mu tea tàbí omi

text.English: Would you like to eat this evening
text.Yoruba: Ṣé wàá jẹun ní alẹ́ yìí
Mo ti yó, ìwọ ń kọ́?

text.English: What will you like to eat
I would like to eat yam and egg
text.Yoruba: iṣu àti ẹyin ló ń wù mí jẹ

text.English: I would like to eat pounded yam and efo riro
text.Yoruba: Mo fẹ́ jẹ iyán àti ẹ̀fọ́

text.English: Waiter please bring me the menu
text.Yoruba: Waiter, ẹ Jọ̀ọ́ ẹ bá mi mú àtẹ oúnjẹ yín wá

text.English: Please call ahead to make a reservation
text.Yoruba: Dákun ẹ ti pè sílẹ̀ láti gba àyè

text.English: What will you like to buy?
text.Yoruba: Kín ni ó wù yín rà?

text.English: I would like to buy a city map
text.Yoruba: Yóò wù mí láti ra máàpù ìlú

text.English: I would like to buy a pair of shoes
text.Yoruba: Ó wù mí láti ra bàtà
Èló ni gbogbo rẹ̀ jẹ́ papọ̀
Mo ti sọ àpamọ́wọ́ mi nù

text.English: I would like to exchange dollars
text.Yoruba: Mo fẹ́ ṣé dollar sí euro

text.English: I caught a cold and cough the whole morning
text.Yoruba: Òtútù kó sí mi láyà, mo sì wúkọ̀ ní gbogbo àárọ̀

text.English: I have a fever of 39 degrees
text.Yoruba: mo ní ibà, ooru ara mi wọn oókandínlógójì

text.English: I am ill, I feel very unwell
text.Yoruba: Ara mi kò yá, ó rẹ̀mí gan an

Yoruba: Mo máa ní ẹ̀fọ́rí ní gbogbo ìgbà
Mo máa ní orí fífọ́ ní gbogbo ìgbà

text.English: My stomach hurts, what shall I do
text.Yoruba: Inú ń dùn mí, kín ni máa ṣe

text.English: I hope you get well soon

text.Yoruba: Àwọ̀ ara mi kò gbà ìgbàkugbà
Ṣé nnkan kan wáà tí ó máa ń dà ọ́ láàmú

text.English: Who is the owner of this dog?
What do you do for work?
Where did you go yesterday's evening?
text.Yoruba: Níbo lo lọ ní ìrọ̀lẹ́ àná?
Akọ̀wé wo lo nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí jù?
Òṣèré wo lo nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí jù?

text.English: Please don't make so much noise
Please wait for me for a little while
text.Yoruba: Dákun dúró fún mi díẹ̀ si

text.English: I will be back in a second
Let have a rest for 10 min
text.Yoruba: Ẹ jẹ́ ká sinmi fún ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́wàá

text.English: Let's go to the movie theater
text.Yoruba: Ẹ jẹ́ kí á lọ ilé ìwòran

text.English: Please walk a little bit slower
Please switch off your mobile phone
When will you return my money
text.Yoruba: Ìgbà wo lo ma dáwó mi padà

text.English: This is a very good idea
This is a very interesting topic
I want to know your point of view
text.Yoruba: Mo fẹ́ mọ èrò inú rẹ

text.English: I don't understand what you mean
text.Yoruba: Nnkan tí o sọ kò yé mi

text.English: I don't think I have done anything wrong
text.Yoruba: Mi ò rò pé mo ṣe nnkan tí kò dára

text.English: I sent you a text message
text.Yoruba: Mo fi àtẹ̀ ìjíṣẹ́ kan rán ni sí ẹ

text.English: My mobile phone is not working
Where did you lose your mobile phone?
text.Yoruba: Níbo lo ti sọ ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ rẹ nù?

text.English: Tomorrow I will send you an email
text.Yoruba: Máa fi email ránsẹ́ sí ọ lọ́la

text.English: How dare you talk to me like that
text.Yoruba: Kín ni ó gbé jẹ tí o fi ń bá mi sọ̀rọ̀ bá yẹn
Ṣe o lè ràn mí lọ́wọ́?

text.English: Can you please call an ambulance?
text.Yoruba: Dákun ṣe ó le pe ambulance
Má bínú, mi ò le ràn án lọ́wọ́

text.English: I have to return home now
text.Yoruba: Mo gbọ́dọ̀ ma lọ ilé ní isìnyìí

text.English: What is the way to the post office
Is there anybody sitting on this seat
text.Yoruba: Ǹ jẹ́ ẹni kankan jókòó sí orí àga yìí

text.English: May I ask you a question
text.Yoruba: Ṣé mo lè bí ẹ bi ẹ ní ìbéèrè kan

text.English: I am very sorry to disturb you
text.Yoruba: Ẹ máa bínú pé mo dà mú yín
Kí ni o sọ ní isìnyìí

text.English: I have a dream (sleep and dream)
My dream is to make the world a better place
text.Yoruba: Àlá mi láti jẹ́ kí ilé ayé yìí dára si

text.English: Do not care about what others have to say
text.Yoruba: Má ro nǹkan tí wọn fẹ́ sọ
Nǹkan tí ó bá rí o sọ
Kò sí nnkan tó kàn mí nípa rẹ
Àní kò sí nnkan tí mò lè ṣe
Nnkan náà bà mí lọ́kàn jẹ̀ ẹ́

text.English: A child that disrespects his mum
text.Yoruba: Ọmọ tó mọ́ ìyá rẹ lójú ó

text.English: Children call each other to play
text.Yoruba: Àwọn ọmọdé pe ara wọn jọ láti ṣeré

text.English: After forming a circle, Tọ́lá stay behind the circle
text.Yoruba: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n pagbo bíríkíti ni Tọ́lá bọ́ sí ẹ̀yìn agbo
Ó mú aṣọ kékeré kan lọ́wọ́

text.English: He walks round the circle while singing
text.Yoruba: Ó sì ń rìn yíká agbo náà, ó ń dá orin

text.English: If I wake up in the morning
I will use clean water to wash my face
I will put chewing stick in my mouth
I will throw away the rubbish into the refuse dump
I will put the remaining eba in the bin
So the house can be cleaned
text.Yoruba: Kílé ó le dára sí i
